text: Vasopressors ( Norepinephrine ; Arterenol ® Sanofi - Aventis ; Germany ) were used after volume resuscitation according to the sepsis guideline ( 13 ) . Renal replacement therapy was performed with citrate anticoagulation ( Multifiltrate , Fresenius Medical Care , Bad Homburg v . d . H . Germany ) in patients with acute renal failure .
